name: cnem's Advanced Pixel Gun Simulator
description:
This game is a simulator game not like most. In this game, you can simulate almost fully realistic guns... but in a pixel art style.

Please definitely give me feature suggestions, feedback, and tell me about bugs.

Discord: CBN#2156 

Credit:

Audio/SFX used in project (links): https://f8studios.itch.io/snakes-authentic-gun-sounds | https://f8studios.itch.io/snakes-second-authentic-gun-sounds-pack | https://kenney.nl/assets/interface-sounds | https://kenney.nl/assets/impact-sounds (not currently being used in project but it is in the project files)

Fonts used in project: ModeSeven (can be found on fontspace.com) | Batman Future (can be found on fontspace.com)

Music used (link): https://pixabay.com/music/bossa-nova-waiting-music-116216/ (not currently being used in project but it is in the project files)

All art assets (Sprites, UI, etc...) made by me.
